description: You are given a sequence of integers $ a_{1},a_{2},...,a_{n} $ . Let ![](https://cdn.luogu.com.cn/upload/vjudge_pic/CF889E/babd3332060a4ee6973a9fa3f688c744930d9a0a.png), and ![](https://cdn.luogu.com.cn/upload/vjudge_pic/CF889E/3a61ca4726dc1db34df92b20859e100704661de5.png) for $ 1<=i<n $ . Here, ![](https://cdn.luogu.com.cn/upload/vjudge_pic/CF889E/609a42354b344d4b30f3720c48d42a71dbe37fb8.png) denotes the modulus operation. Find the maximum value of $ f(x,1) $ over all nonnegative integers $ x $ .
inputFormat:
The first line contains a single integer $ n $ ( $ 1<=n<=200000 $ ) — the length of the sequence.

The second lines contains $ n $ integers $ a_{1},a_{2},...,a_{n} $ ( $ 1<=a_{i}<=10^{13} $ ) — the elements of the sequence.
outputFormat: Output a single integer — the maximum value of $ f(x,1) $ over all nonnegative integers $ x $ .
hint:
In the first example you can choose, for example, $ x=19 $ .

In the second example you can choose, for example, $ x=3 $ or $ x=2 $ .
translation:
$$f(x,n) =   x \mod a_n$$
$$f(x,i) = ( x \mod a_i ) + f(x \mod a_i,i+1)$$

给出a序列，当x取遍所有非负整数时$f(x,1)$的最大值。
